name: Johnsonville Italian Sausage, Onions & Peppers Skillet
author: From the Kitchen at Johnsonville Sausage
summary: Need a quick and hearty lunch? Precooked Italian sausage slices with sauteed bell peppers and diced tomatoes make a zesty meal--served as is or piled on a hoagie roll.
ingredients: 1 (22 ounce) package frozen Johnsonville® Mild Italian Sausage Slices
1 medium green bell pepper, thinly sliced
1 medium red bell pepper, thinly sliced
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with basil, garlic and oregano
directions: In a large skillet, saute the sausage, peppers, onion and garlic in oil until vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes
Cook and stir for 5 minutes or until heated through
